author: fwyzard
body:
- add customisations to use the 25ns v0 and 50ns v0 L1 menus
- separate the L1 customisations for 50ns, 25ns and heavy ions
- move L1 HI menu customisation from L1Trigger_custom.py to customise_overwriteL1Menu.py
- update SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration/python/postLS1Customs.py
title: update the L1 and HLT post-LS1 customisations
